scripts.clean:project: sudo rm -rf frontend/node_modules frontend/package-lock.json && rm -rf frontend/.nuxt frontend/.output && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && rm -rf server/node_modules server/package-lock.json
scripts.clean:vscode: rm -rf ~/Library/Application\ Support/Code/User/globalStorage/github.copilot-* && rm -rf ~/Library/Application\ Support/Code/logs/* && rm -rf ~/Library/Application\ Support/Code/CachedData/* && rm -rf ~/Library/Application\ Support/Code/User/workspaceStorage/* && rm -rf ~/.vscode/extensions/github.copilot-* && rm -rf ~/.vscode/extensions/github.copilot-chat-* && rm -rf ~/.vscode/extensions/github.copilot-labs-*
scripts.clean:system: npm cache clean --force && docker system prune -a
